title: Meeting with Marketing Team
summary: Discussed Q2 campaign performance. SEO improved by 18%. Email open rates down 5%. Plan to A/B test subject lines. Next meeting scheduled for April 10.

title: Book Summary: Atomic Habits
summary: Key takeaway: Small habits compound over time. Focus on systems, not goals. Make habits obvious, attractive, easy, and satisfying.

title: Therapy Reflection - April 6
summary: Talked about setting boundaries with work. Realized need to prioritize rest. Agreed to try journaling nightly for clarity.

title: Startup Pitch Prep
summary: Focused on refining problem statement. Practiced 3-minute pitch. Feedback: clarify target audience and emphasize traction metrics.

title: Weekly Goals Planning
summary: Outlined goals for the week: finalize onboarding flow, update landing page copy, and schedule user interviews. Prioritized by urgency and impact.

title: AI Research Paper Summary
summary: Paper explores transformer-based models for language generation. Introduces a hybrid fine-tuning approach that improves coherence in long-form outputs.

title: Personal Journal Entry
summary: Reflected on productivity highs and lows. Noticed correlation between sleep quality and focus. Planning to stick to 11 PM bedtime for a week.

title: Customer Interview #3
summary: Interviewee expressed frustration with current app onboarding. Suggested adding a quick demo video. Noted excitement about the analytics dashboard.
